title: Yarralumla, Australian Capital Territory
summary: Yarralumla (/ˈjærəlʌmlə/) is a large inner south suburb of Canberra, the capital city of Australia. Located approximately 3.5 kilometres (2.2 mi) south-west of the city, Yarralumla extends along the south-west bank of Lake Burley Griffin from Scrivener Dam to Commonwealth Avenue.
